message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you first because I think you'll really appreciate it. I'm asking for $95, which I believe is a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $85 is cutting it too close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $90?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable offering $87. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.
